mapper.sql: ctlBreId, startTime, endTime, docId, type, currentState
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM evt_ctl_breath a ,doc_anaes_record d WHERE a.docId = d.anaRecordId AND d.regOptId = #{regOptId} AND a.`currentState` = '1' ORDER BY currentState DESC ,startTime ASC
SELECT a.* FROM evt_ctl_breath a WHERE a.`docId`= #{docId} AND a.`currentState` = '1' ORDER BY currentState DESC ,startTime ASC
mapper.insert:
insert into evt_ctl_breath
ctlBreId,
startTime,
endTime,
docId,
type,
currentState,
#{ctlBreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{currentState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update evt_ctl_breath
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
currentState = #{currentState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ctlBreId = #{ctlBreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update evt_ctl_breath set startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, currentState = #{currentState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ctlBreId = #{ctlBreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
